page.title: 11CHILDSWICKHAM CHURCH
page.content: About 65 people worship in the church, {St. Mary the Virgin,}each week, 10% of the population. The prayer book of 1662 is used at Holy Communion at 8.00am on Sundays, Saints Days and Evensong. The Alternative Service Book 1980 at all other services. It is now customary for members of the congregation to read the Lessons at Holy Communion. Evensong is said every weekday by a lay person. A choir of twelve people lead the singing on Sunday mornings. The Parochial Church Council has 10 members, 2 Deanery Synod Representatives and 2 Church Wardens. The congregation is caring for individuals in the parish, home missions and charities and for the work of the church overseas.
